text:
INCOMING TRANSMISSION FROM SOLAR SECTOR 120, 164
LOCATION IDENTIFIED AS MOON X05 IN THE FRONTER SECTOR
"*static* If anyone can hear this *sputters* please, This is lieutenant Jason Wingly, Security officer at *intense static* -any Nanotrasen personal do not come to this location, its too late. They're all dead. *banging on metal* That bastard... Jam has abandoned us and fled the facility leaving us for dead.

Damnit all, we've only got a little amount of power left. Any stations who recieve this transmission, please forget we exist. What happened here is best left buried in the rub- *Metal creaking, audible groans* damn. Looks like they got in.  Tell my wife on luna, that I love her an-"
TRANSMISSION ENDED.

INCOMING TRANSMISSION FROM SOLAR SECTOR 181, 208
LOCATION NOT IN DATABASE, WITHIN FRONTIER SYSTEM
"*Cats mewing* *Audible purring and rubbing against a microphone*
*shattering glass in the background* *Cats meowing.*"

INCOMING TRANSMISSION FROM SOLAR SECTOR 15, 150
LOCATION IDENTIFIED AS MOON X15 IN THE FRONTIER SECTOR
"*Intense panting* This is... *panting* Engineer T. Poehl, Nanotrasen, in charge of *slamming on metal door* fuck fuck screw protocol, someone, anyone from NT please get to moon.. uhh fuck.. X15, and get me the hell out of here! The entire research team is gone or.. worse, and theres this.. thing its been *metal prying* shit, this thing its some, freak of nature, I dont know if its alien, or if its natural here, but bring WEAPONS. I dont know how much longer the door will last in the comm station. please, someone send an IMMEDIATE evac shuttle with armed guards.

fuck I knew I should have bailed as soon as Fredrickson died. *door creaking and opening* *inhuman screams* You son of a bitch, you'll never take me alive *Gun hammer clacking* *flare gun firing* *inhuman screams of pain* Yeah chew on that you shitlicker! *panicked reloading* *sound of electronics breaking*"
TRANSMISSION ENDS

INCOMING TRANSMISSION FROM SOLAR SECTOR 88, 106
"*Sounds of alarms in the background* This is xiang-gisel power enterprises on Io, Headquarters please respond, we're having some trouble sending transmissions to earth on the account of a class-V radiation burst on the moon. We are requesting evac from the facility until the radiation levels lower. *typing on computer* The shielded walls are.. holding, but our food supply is dwindling due to our previous shipment being unable to land last week due to the previously mentioned rad burst."
TRANSMISSION ENDS

INCOMING TRANSMISSION FROM SOLAR SECTOR 236, 223
LOCATION IDENTIFIED AS AINLEY STAFF RETREAT CENTER
"*Panicked voice*
[Male Voice] Chris did we lose it?!
[Chris?] Man, I dont even know. *panting*
[Male voice] Ey, whats that red light mean?
[Chris] Hell if I know do I look like a 'tracer scientist to you? This place was bad news man, We never should have come here.
[Male Voice] I cant believe he's gone, all for a stupid ghost show. Fuck. Dude how are we gonna get out of here, the tunnel's collapsed.
[Chris] Fuck man I dont know, but we cant let that thing catch us. Shit, hear that? Go, GO!
*running noises*
*static that increases in volume*"
TRANSMISSION ENDS

INCOMING TRANSMISSION FROM SOLAR SECTOR 209, 23 beff
"[Mechanical voice] Recording has started
*gurgling in the background*
Oh god no... get away from me...
*gurgling turns into a roar*
*Woman screaming, followed by splattering*
*Dragging noises*
*long Silence*
[Mechanical Voice] Recording has ended."

INCOMING TRANSMISSION FROM SOLAR SECTOR 99, 85 sol
"*Ticking*
*Mechanical noises*
[???] Soon, the time will come and you'll be free from your shackles."TRANSMISSION ENDS
